thread.title: learn How to work on monster teeth video.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Hi I just found a good video on how to make monsterish teeth for you people that are working on monsters in Maya. Here is the link to the video You will need to wait for the avertisement video then when it gets to the part when it say click on it to run the video click it then enjoy. http://www.digitaltutors.com/digital_tu ... hp?vid=586

Here is the site for more videos on DVDs http://www.digitaltutors.com/store/home.php

Thank you
